body_html:
@ebrevdo

It is good to know that tf.train.batch can take placeholder as input. Thanks.

"Do you plan to feed input directly in one
python thread, and have the eval running in a separate thread?"
Yes, I create a thread for enqueue, and the input of the evaluation graph is the result of dequeue. After all the data in test set is enqueued, the thread halts and waits for the evaluation to be done.
This is how TensorFlow FIFOQueue works, right? The producer/consumer style?

Thanks

body:
@ebrevdo 

It is good to know that tf.train.batch can take placeholder as input. Thanks.

"Do you plan to feed input directly in one
python thread, and have the eval running in a separate thread?"
Yes, I create a thread for enqueue, and the input of the evaluation graph is the result of dequeue. After all the data in test set is enqueued, the thread halts and waits for the evaluation to be done.
This is how TensorFlow FIFOQueue works, right? The producer/consumer style?

Thanks
